forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 11am, then a chance of snow and a chance of freezing drizzle and a slight chance of drizzle. Cloudy, with a high near 35. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before midnight, then a chance of rain between midnight and 1am, then a chance of freezing drizzle and a chance of drizzle. Cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 7am. Mostly cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 27. Northwest wind 2 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before noon, then a chance of rain between noon and 1pm, then a chance of snow between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy. High near 35, with temperatures falling to around 33 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run was spectacular today with the beautiful blue sky day! Thanks to the wonderful crew who works so hard on making snow and grooming!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful start to the day a light wind and a clear sky. The grooming looks excellent and the snow is in good shape. The temperature is forecast to go slightly above freezing this afternoon. Pintail Peak is now open. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is broccoli cheddar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
